1)Comb the hair ensure there is no tangles. Turn out the wig cap and put it into 95-104 Fahrenheit water, adding shampoo into the water,gently wash hair in 10-15 minutes until it is lean. Don't rub with hands. 2)Rinse shampoo thoroughly and pull conditioner into water. Stir it evenly. Leave wig in conditioner for 10-15 minutes. 3)Rinse conditioner thoroughly and use a towel to absorb the water. 4)Turn the wig cap back. For straight wig, choose the wide-toothed comb to comb. For wavy wig, hold the cap by hand, shake it 5- 6 times, run with fingers smooth gently. Put the wig onto a wig model and let it air dry. Don’t make the hair under the blazing sun for quite a long time. Please clean your wig twice in a week.
